immunity_markdown: death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious
markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zombie Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=425)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Necromantic augmentations have granted this zombie increased size and power.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Zombie_ZombieBrute.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Zombie Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=425)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 341</row>

**Perception** +4; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** -3

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A zombie is permanently slowed 1 and can’t use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 70
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

**Weaknesses**
positive 10, slashing 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +11 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d12+5 bludgeoning plus Improved Push 5 feet 

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-103" />
name: Zombie Brute
